##### FILE: dev_manifest_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/go-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: go-api-app
  name: go-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-api-label
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-api-label
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: localhost/my-go-api-kustomize:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: go-api-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/content
          name: go-api-content-file
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: go-api-content-configmap
        name: go-api-content-file

---

##### FILE: dev18_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/react-ui-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: react-ui
    env: dev
  name: react-ui-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: react-ui
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: react-ui
        env: dev
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: thiernos/ui
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: react-ui
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 500Mi

---

##### FILE: dev19.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dev/Deployment/my-application-dev:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-application-dev
  namespace: dev
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-application
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-application
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: my-application:dev
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
        name: my-application
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: dev
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/n8n-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: n8n-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GENERIC_TIMEZONE
          value: Europe/Istanbul
        - name: EXECUTIONS_PROCESS
          value: main
        - name: NODE_OPTIONS
          value: --max-old-space-size=4096
        image: n8nio/n8n:0.227.0
        name: n8n-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi

---

##### FILE: devam-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/n8n-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: n8n-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GENERIC_TIMEZONE
          value: Europe/Istanbul
        - name: EXECUTIONS_PROCESS
          value: main
        - name: NODE_OPTIONS
          value: --max-old-space-size=4096
        image: n8nio/n8n:0.227.0
        name: n8n-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.n8n
          name: n8n-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: n8n-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-pvc

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: n8n-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GENERIC_TIMEZONE
          value: Europe/Istanbul
        - name: EXECUTIONS_PROCESS
          value: main
        - name: NODE_OPTIONS
          value: --max-old-space-size=4096
        - name: CUSTOM_REDIS_HOST
          value: redis-service
        image: n8nio/n8n:0.227.0
        name: n8n-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.n8n
          name: n8n-persistent-storage
          subPath: n8n-storage
      volumes:
      - name: n8n-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-pvc

##### FILE: devam-deployment4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/n8n-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: n8n-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GENERIC_TIMEZONE
          value: Europe/Istanbul
        - name: EXECUTIONS_PROCESS
          value: main
        - name: NODE_OPTIONS
          value: --max-old-space-size=4096
        - name: CUSTOM_REDIS_HOST
          value: redis-service
        image: n8nio/n8n:0.227.0
        name: n8n-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.n8n
          name: n8n-persistent-storage
          subPath: n8n-storage
      volumes:
      - name: n8n-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-pvc

Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/develop:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: develop
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/develop:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: develop
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/develop:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: develop
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ${NAMESPACE}/Deployment/container-maker-development:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: container-maker-development
  name: container-maker-development
  namespace: ${NAMESPACE}
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: container-maker-development
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: container-maker-development
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SERVER_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: server.key
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: SERVER_CRT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: server.crt
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: CLIENT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client.key
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: CLIENT_CRT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client.crt
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: CA_CRT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ca.crt
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: NFS_IP
          value: 10.105.3.108
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /export
        image: zim95/container-maker-development:latest
        name: container-maker-development
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50051
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app
          name: app-code
      serviceAccountName: resources-sa
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: ${HOSTPATH}
          type: Directory
        name: app-code

##### FILE: devicegateway-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/devicegateway-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: devicegateway-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: devicegateway
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: devicegateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: IMAGE_REPOSITORY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: IMAGE_REPOSITORY
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: target_url
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: target_url
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: SERVER_URL
          value: https://$(target_url)
        - name: java_profiles
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: java_profiles
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: $(java_profiles)
        - name: MQTT_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MQTT_HOSTNAME
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: CASSANDRA_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CASSANDRA_PORT
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: CASSANDRA_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CASSANDRA_HOSTNAME
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        image: $(IMAGE_REPOSITORY)/devicegateway:stud-joris
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: devicegateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8449
        - containerPort: 8450
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/mongo-user
          name: mongo-user
          subPath: mongo-user
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/mongo-user-passwd
          name: mongo-user-passwd
          subPath: mongo-user-passwd
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/cassandra-username
          name: cassandra-username
          subPath: cassandra-username
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/cassandra-password
          name: cassandra-password
          subPath: cassandra-password
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/shutdown-secret
          name: shutdown-secret
          subPath: shutdown-secret
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/device-gateway-mqtt
          name: device-gateway-mqtt
          subPath: device-gateway-mqtt
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: nexus-secrets
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-user
        secret:
          secretName: mongo-user
      - name: mongo-user-passwd
        secret:
          secretName: mongo-user-passwd
      - name: cassandra-username
        secret:
          secretName: cassandra-username
      - name: cassandra-password
        secret:
          secretName: cassandra-password
      - name: shutdown-secret
        secret:
          secretName: shutdown-secret
      - name: device-gateway-mqtt
        secret:
          secretName: device-gateway-mqtt
status: {}

---

kind: Deployment

  name: devicegateway-depl
  namespace: default
spec:

    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: devicegateway
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: devicegateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: IMAGE_REPOSITORY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: IMAGE_REPOSITORY
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_HOST
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: target_url
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: target_url
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: SERVER_URL
          value: https://$(target_url)
        - name: java_profiles
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: java_profiles
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: $(java_profiles)
        - name: MQTT_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MQTT_HOSTNAME
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: CASSANDRA_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CASSANDRA_PORT
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        - name: CASSANDRA_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CASSANDRA_HOSTNAME
              name: ihotraco-configmap
        image: $(IMAGE_REPOSITORY)/devicegateway:stud-joris
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: devicegateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8449
        - containerPort: 8450
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/mongo-user
          name: mongo-user
          subPath: mongo-user
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/mongo-user-passwd
          name: mongo-user-passwd
          subPath: mongo-user-passwd

          name: cassandra-username
          subPath: cassandra-username
        - mountPath: /run/secrets/cassandra-password
          name: cassandra-password
          subPath: cassandra-password

          name: shutdown-secret
          subPath: shutdown-secret

          subPath: device-gateway-mqtt

          secretName: mongo-user-passwd

          secretName: cassandra-password

##### FILE: devicegateway-hpa.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/devicegateway-depl:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: devicegateway-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 20
        type: Percent
        value: 20
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 20
        type: Pods
        value: 1
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 3
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: devicegateway-depl

---

##### FILE: device-plugin.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nvshare-system/DaemonSet/nvshare-device-plugin:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: nvshare-device-plugin
  namespace: nvshare-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nvshare-device-plugin
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        name: nvshare-device-plugin
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - infinity
        image: beclab/nvshare:libnvshare-v0.0.1
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - test -f /host-var-run-nvshare/libnvshare.so || ( test -d /host-var-run-nvshare/libnvshare.so
                && rm -rf /host-var-run-nvshare/libnvshare.so && false ) || touch
                /host-var-run-nvshare/libnvshare.so && mount -v --bind /libnvshare.so
                /host-var-run-nvshare/libnvshare.so
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - umount -v /host-var-run-nvshare/libnvshare.so && rm -rf /host-var-run-nvshare/libnvshare.so
        name: nvshare-lib
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host-var-run-nvshare
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: host-var-run-nvshare
      - env:
        - name: NVSHARE_VIRTUAL_DEVICES
          value: "10"
        image: bytetrade/nvshare:nvshare-device-plugin
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nvshare-device-plugin
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
          name: device-plugin-socket
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - '[ -d /var/run/nvshare/libnvshare.so ] && rm -rf /var/run/nvshare/libnvshare.so
          || true'
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: init-dir
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/nvshare
          name: host-var-run-nvshare
      nodeSelector:
        gpu.bytetrade.io/cuda-supported: "true"
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      runtimeClassName: nvidia
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: nvidia.com/gpu
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/nvshare
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: host-var-run-nvshare
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
        name: device-plugin-socket

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: nvidia-device-plugin-daemonset

    matchLabels:

        name: nvidia-device-plugin-ds
    spec:

      - env:
        - name: FAIL_ON_INIT_ERROR
          value: "false"
        image: www.kb-sys.co.kr/nvcr.io/nvidia/k8s-device-plugin:v0.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nvidia-device-plugin-ctr
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
          name: device-plugin
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        konvoy.mesosphere.com/gpu-provider: NVIDIA
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/device-plugins
          type: ""
        name: device-plugin
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: devicetopic-modelgroup01-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: devicetopic-modelgroup01
        uba-displayName: UBA_Streaming_Models_devicetopic-modelgroup01
        uba-groupName: ubastreamingmodels
        uba-serviceName: realtimemodels
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.KafkaModelFunctionExecutor
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -G
        - devicetopic-modelgroup01
        - -f
        - DeviceExploitChainModel
        - -f
        - IpTrafficBeaconStreamDetection
        - -f
        - WebBeaconStreamDetection
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 3G
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubastreamingmodels
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: devicetopic-modelgroup01
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

##### FILE: dev-with-strategy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: lovelearnlinux/webserver:v1
        name: hello-pod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi

---

##### FILE: dex_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to auth-system/Deployment/dex:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    reloader.stakater.com/auto: "true"
  labels:
    app: dex
  name: dex
  namespace: auth-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dex
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dex
        revision: "1"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/local/bin/dex
        - serve
        - /etc/dex/cfg/config.yaml
        env:
        - name: KUBERNETES_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.30.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/dex/cfg
          name: config
        - mountPath: /etc/dex/tls
          name: tls
        - mountPath: /web/themes/custom/
          name: theme
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      serviceAccountName: dex
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: tls
        secret:
          secretName: dex
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: config.yaml
            path: config.yaml
          name: dex
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: theme

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: dex_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to auth-system/Ingress/dex:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: selfsigned-issuer
    ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-body-size: "0"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "600"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-send-timeout: "600"
  name: dex
  namespace: auth-system
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: auth.apps.k8s.cloudcafe.tech
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: dex
            port:
              number: 5556
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - auth.apps.k8s.cloudcafe.tech
    secretName: dex

---

##### FILE: dex5_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dex/Deployment/dex:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dex
  name: dex
  namespace: dex
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dex
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dex
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/local/bin/dex
        - serve
        - /etc/dex/cfg/config.yaml
        env:
        - name: GITHUB_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client-id
              name: github-client
        - name: GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client-secret
              name: github-client
        - name: STATIC_HASH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: static-hash-password
              name: github-client
        - name: STATIC_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: static-secret
              name: github-client
        - name: KUBERNETES_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.32.0
        name: dex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5556
            scheme: HTTPS
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/dex/cfg/config.yaml
          name: config
          subPath: config.yaml
        - mountPath: /etc/dex/tls
          name: tls
          readOnly: true
      nodeSelector:
        node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane: "true"
      serviceAccountName: dex
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.yaml
            path: config.yaml
          name: dex
        name: config
      - name: tls
        secret:
          secretName: dex-tls

---

    issuer: https://dex.k3s.lifoto.co:32000
    logger:
      level: "debug"
    storage:
      type: kubernetes
      config:
        inCluster: true
    web:
      https: 0.0.0.0:5556
      tlsCert: /etc/dex/tls/tls.crt
      tlsKey: /etc/dex/tls/tls.key
    oauth2:
      responseTypes: ["code", "token", "id_token"]
      skipApprovalScreen: true

    connectors:
    - type: github
      id: github
      name: GitHub
      config:
        clientID: $GITHUB_CLIENT_ID
        clientSecret: $GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET
        redirectURI: https://dex.k3s.lifoto.co:32000/callback
        orgs:
          - name: kubequest-lil

    enablePasswordDB: true
    staticPasswords:
    - email: "ed.paillard@gmail.com"
      # bcrypt hash of the string "password": $(echo password | htpasswd -BinC 10 admin | cut -d: -f2)

      username: "admin"
      userID: "08a8684b-db88-4b73-90a9-3cd1661f5466"

      redirectURIs:
      - https://login.k3s.lifoto.co/callback

##### FILE: dex6_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dex/Deployment/dex:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dex
  name: dex
  namespace: dex
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dex
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dex
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/local/bin/dex
        - serve
        - /etc/dex/cfg/config.yaml
        env:
        - name: GITHUB_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client-id
              name: github-client
        - name: GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client-secret
              name: github-client
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.32.0
        name: dex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5556
            scheme: HTTPS
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/dex/cfg
          name: config
        - mountPath: /etc/dex/tls
          name: tls
      serviceAccountName: dex
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.yaml
            path: config.yaml
          name: dex
        name: config
      - name: tls
        secret:
          secretName: dex.example.com.tls

---

##### FILE: dex-k8s-authenticator_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dex/Deployment/dex-k8s-authenticator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dex-k8s-authenticator
  namespace: dex
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dex-k8s-authenticator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dex-k8s-authenticator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - config.yaml
        env:
        - name: GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client-secret
              name: github-client
        - name: STATIC_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: static-secret
              name: github-client
        image: mintel/dex-k8s-authenticator
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dex-k8s-authenticator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5555
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config.yaml
          name: config
          subPath: config.yaml
        - mountPath: /etc/tls/tls.crt
          name: tls-key
          subPath: ca.crt
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: dex-k8s-authenticator
        name: config
      - name: tls-key
        secret:
          secretName: dex-tls

---

##### FILE: dex-k8s-authenticator_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dex/Ingress/dex-k8s-authenticator:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/router.entrypoints: websecure
    traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/router.tls: "true"
  name: dex-k8s-authenticator
  namespace: dex
spec:
  ingressClassName: traefik
  rules:
  - host: login.k3s.lifoto.co
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: dex-k8s-authenticator
            port:
              number: 5555
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - login.k3s.lifoto.co
    secretName: cert-auth-login

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    backstage.io/kubernetes-id: dice-roller
  name: dice-roller-incorrect-probe
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dice-roller-incorrect-probe
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dice-roller-incorrect-probe
        backstage.io/kubernetes-id: dice-roller
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi

            name: busybox
          restartPolicy: OnFailure

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app: dicom
  name: dicom
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: orthanc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: orthanc
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jodogne/orthanc-plugins:1.12.5
        name: orthanc
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8042
        - containerPort: 4242
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/orthanc/db
          name: orthanc-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/orthanc
          name: json-configmap-volume
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - name: orthanc-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: orthanc-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: json-configmap
        name: json-configmap-volume

##### FILE: dicom-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dicom/Ingress/dicom-nginx-cluster-local:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/configuration-snippet: |
      add_header 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' '*' always;
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: dicom-nginx-cluster-local
  namespace: dicom
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: k2s.cluster.local
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: dicom
            port:
              number: 8042
        path: /dicom(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

##### FILE: different_fileformat.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/pod-different-file-format-log:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: pod-different-file-format-log
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      i=0; while true; do
        echo "$i: $(date)" >> /var/log/1.log;
        echo "$(date) INFO $i" >> /var/log/2.log
        i=$((i+1));
        sleep 1;
      done;
    image: busybox
    name: containerv6
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/log
      name: varlog
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: varlog

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/pod-different-file-format-log failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/pod-different-file-format-log failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

##### FILE: dify-deployment_14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/StatefulSet/dify-weaviate:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dify-weaviate
  namespace: dify
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dify-weaviate
  serviceName: dify-weaviate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dify-weaviate
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: QUERY_DEFAULTS_LIMIT
          value: "25"
        - name: AUTHENTICATION_ANONYMOUS_ACCESS_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: PERSISTENCE_DATA_PATH
          value: /var/lib/weaviate
        - name: DEFAULT_VECTORIZER_MODULE
          value: none
        - name: AUTHENTICATION_APIKEY_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: AUTHENTICATION_APIKEY_ALLOWED_KEYS
          value: WVF5YThaHlkYwhGUSmCRgsX3tD5ngdN8pkih
        - name: AUTHENTICATION_APIKEY_USERS
          value: hello@dify.ai
        - name: AUTHORIZATION_ADMINLIST_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: AUTHORIZATION_ADMINLIST_USERS
          value: hello@dify.ai
        image: semitechnologies/weaviate:1.19.0
        name: dify-weaviate
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: weaviate-p
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 102Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/weaviate
          name: weaviate-data
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: dify-weaviate
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/ConfigMap/ssrf-proxy-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  squid.conf: "acl localnet src 0.0.0.1-0.255.255.255\t# RFC 1122 \"this\" network
    (LAN)\nacl localnet src 10.0.0.0/8\t\t# RFC 1918 local private network (LAN)\nacl
    localnet src 100.64.0.0/10\t\t# RFC 6598 shared address space (CGN)\nacl localnet
    src 169.254.0.0/16 \t# RFC 3927 link-local (directly plugged) machines\nacl localnet
    src 172.16.0.0/12\t\t# RFC 1918 local private network (LAN)\nacl localnet src
    192.168.0.0/16\t\t# RFC 1918 local private network (LAN)\nacl localnet src fc00::/7
    \      \t# RFC 4193 local private network range\nacl localnet src fe80::/10      \t#
    RFC 4291 link-local (directly plugged) machines\nacl SSL_ports port 443\n# acl
    SSL_ports port 1025-65535   # Enable the configuration to resolve this issue:
    https://github.com/langgenius/dify/issues/12792\nacl Safe_ports port 80\t\t# http\nacl
    Safe_ports port 21\t\t# ftp\nacl Safe_ports port 443\t\t# https\nacl Safe_ports
    port 70\t\t# gopher\nacl Safe_ports port 210\t\t# wais\nacl Safe_ports port 1025-65535\t#
    unregistered ports\nacl Safe_ports port 280\t\t# http-mgmt\nacl Safe_ports port
    488\t\t# gss-http\nacl Safe_ports port 591\t\t# filemaker\nacl Safe_ports port
    777\t\t# multiling http\nacl CONNECT method CONNECT\nhttp_access deny !Safe_ports\nhttp_access
    deny CONNECT !SSL_ports\nhttp_access allow localhost manager\nhttp_access deny
    manager\nhttp_access allow localhost\nhttp_access allow localnet\nhttp_access
    deny all\n\n################################## Proxy Server ################################\nhttp_port
    3128\ncoredump_dir /var/spool/squid\nrefresh_pattern ^ftp:\t\t1440\t20%!\(MISSING)t10080\nrefresh_pattern
    ^gopher:\t1440\t0%!\(MISSING)t1440\nrefresh_pattern -i (/cgi-bin/|\\?) 0\t0%!\(MISSING)t0\nrefresh_pattern
    \\/(Packages|Sources)(|\\.bz2|\\.gz|\\.xz)$ 0 0%!r(MISSING)efresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern
    \\/Release(|\\.gpg)$ 0 0%!r(MISSING)efresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern \\/InRelease$ 0 0%!
(MISSING)    refresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern \\/(Translation-.*)(|\\.bz2|\\.gz|\\.xz)$ 0 0%!
(MISSING)    refresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern .\t\t0\t20%!\(MISSING)t4320\n\n\n# upstream proxy, set to your
    own upstream proxy IP to avoid SSRF attacks\n# cache_peer 172.1.1.1 parent 3128
    0 no-query no-digest no-netdb-exchange default \n\n\n##################################
    Reverse Proxy To Sandbox ################################\nhttp_port 8194 accel
    vhost\n# Notice:\n# default is 'sandbox' in dify's github repo, here is 'dify-sandbox'
    because the service name of sandbox is 'dify-sandbox'\n# you can change it to
    your own service name\ncache_peer dify-sandbox parent 8194 0 no-query originserver\nacl
    src_all src all\nhttp_access allow src_all\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: ssrf-proxy-config
  namespace: dify

##### FILE: dify-deployment_19.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/ConfigMap/ssrf-proxy-entrypoint:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  docker-entrypoint-mount.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash

    # Modified based on Squid OCI image entrypoint

    # This entrypoint aims to forward the squid logs to stdout to assist users of
    # common container related tooling (e.g., kubernetes, docker-compose, etc) to
    # access the service logs.

    # Moreover, it invokes the squid binary, leaving all the desired parameters to
    # be provided by the "command" passed to the spawned container. If no command
    # is provided by the user, the default behavior (as per the CMD statement in
    # the Dockerfile) will be to use Ubuntu's default configuration [1] and run
    # squid with the "-NYC" options to mimic the behavior of the Ubuntu provided
    # systemd unit.

    # [1] The default configuration is changed in the Dockerfile to allow local
    # network connections. See the Dockerfile for further information.

    echo "[ENTRYPOINT] re-create snakeoil self-signed certificate removed in the build process"
    if [ ! -f /etc/ssl/private/ssl-cert-snakeoil.key ]; then
        /usr/sbin/make-ssl-cert generate-default-snakeoil --force-overwrite > /dev/null 2>&1
    fi

    tail -F /var/log/squid/access.log 2>/dev/null &
    tail -F /var/log/squid/error.log 2>/dev/null &
    tail -F /var/log/squid/store.log 2>/dev/null &
    tail -F /var/log/squid/cache.log 2>/dev/null &

    # Replace environment variables in the template and output to the squid.conf
    echo "[ENTRYPOINT] replacing environment variables in the template"
    awk '{
        while(match($0, /\${[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z_0-9]*}/)) {
            var = substr($0, RSTART+2, RLENGTH-3)
            val = ENVIRON[var]
            $0 = substr($0, 1, RSTART-1) val substr($0, RSTART+RLENGTH)
        }
        print
    }' /etc/squid/squid.conf.template > /etc/squid/squid.conf

    /usr/sbin/squid -Nz
    echo "[ENTRYPOINT] starting squid"
    /usr/sbin/squid -f /etc/squid/squid.conf -NYC 1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: ssrf-proxy-entrypoint
  namespace: dify

---

    notice;\npid        /var/run/nginx.pid;\n\n\nevents {\n    worker_connections
    \ 1024;\n}\n\n\nhttp {\n    include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;\n    default_type
    \ application/octet-stream;\n\n    log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user
    [$time_local] \"$request\" '\n                      '$status $body_bytes_sent
    \"$http_referer\" '\n                      '\"$http_user_agent\" \"$http_x_forwarded_for\"';\n\n
    \   access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;\n\n    sendfile        on;\n
    \   #tcp_nopush     on;\n\n    keepalive_timeout  65;\n\n    #gzip  on;\n    client_max_body_size
    15M;\n\n    server {\n    listen 80;\n    server_name _;\n\n    location /console/api
    {\n      proxy_pass http://dify-api:5001;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For
    $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version
    1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout

    http://dify-api:5001;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port
    $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version 1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection
    \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout 3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout

    X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n
    \     proxy_http_version 1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection \"\";\n      proxy_buffering

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/Deployment/dify-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dify-nginx
  name: dify-nginx
  namespace: dify
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dify-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dify-nginx
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - image: nginx:stable
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dify-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: dify-nginx
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: dify-nginx-config
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: dify-nginx
        name: dify-nginx
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dify-nginx-config

        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dify-postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGUSER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: difyai123456
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: dify
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data
        image: postgres:15-alpine
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - pg_isready
            - -U
            - $(PGUSER)
            - -d
            - $(POSTGRES_DB)
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: dify-postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: postgres-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-data
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: dify-postgres
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /root/dify/db/postgres/data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: postgres-data

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dify-redis
  namespace: dify
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dify-redis
  serviceName: dify-redis

      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dify-redis
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - redis-server
        - --save
        - "20"
        - "1"
        - --loglevel
        - warning
        - --requirepass
        - $(REDIS_PASSWORD)
        env:
        - name: REDIS_PASSWORD
          value: difyai123456
        image: redis:6-alpine
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - redis-cli
            - ping
        name: dify-redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
          name: redis-p
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 102Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: redis-data
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: dify-redis
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /root/dify/db/redis/data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: redis-data

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/ConfigMap/ssrf-proxy-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  squid.conf: "acl localnet src 0.0.0.1-0.255.255.255\t# RFC 1122 \"this\" network
    (LAN)\nacl localnet src 10.0.0.0/8\t\t# RFC 1918 local private network (LAN)\nacl
    localnet src 100.64.0.0/10\t\t# RFC 6598 shared address space (CGN)\nacl localnet
    src 169.254.0.0/16 \t# RFC 3927 link-local (directly plugged) machines\nacl localnet
    src 172.16.0.0/12\t\t# RFC 1918 local private network (LAN)\nacl localnet src
    192.168.0.0/16\t\t# RFC 1918 local private network (LAN)\nacl localnet src fc00::/7
    \      \t# RFC 4193 local private network range\nacl localnet src fe80::/10      \t#
    RFC 4291 link-local (directly plugged) machines\nacl SSL_ports port 443\n# acl
    SSL_ports port 1025-65535   # Enable the configuration to resolve this issue:
    https://github.com/langgenius/dify/issues/12792    \nacl Safe_ports port 80\t\t#
    http\nacl Safe_ports port 21\t\t# ftp\nacl Safe_ports port 443\t\t# https\nacl
    Safe_ports port 70\t\t# gopher\nacl Safe_ports port 210\t\t# wais\nacl Safe_ports
    port 1025-65535\t# unregistered ports\nacl Safe_ports port 280\t\t# http-mgmt\nacl
    Safe_ports port 488\t\t# gss-http\nacl Safe_ports port 591\t\t# filemaker\nacl
    Safe_ports port 777\t\t# multiling http\nacl CONNECT method CONNECT\nhttp_access
    deny !Safe_ports\nhttp_access deny CONNECT !SSL_ports\nhttp_access allow localhost
    manager\nhttp_access deny manager\nhttp_access allow localhost\nhttp_access allow
    localnet\nhttp_access deny all\n\n################################## Proxy Server
    ################################\nhttp_port 3128\ncoredump_dir /var/spool/squid\nrefresh_pattern
    ^ftp:\t\t1440\t20%!\(MISSING)t10080\nrefresh_pattern ^gopher:\t1440\t0%!\(MISSING)t1440\nrefresh_pattern
    -i (/cgi-bin/|\\?) 0\t0%!\(MISSING)t0\nrefresh_pattern \\/(Packages|Sources)(|\\.bz2|\\.gz|\\.xz)$
    0 0%!r(MISSING)efresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern \\/Release(|\\.gpg)$ 0 0%!r(MISSING)efresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern
    \\/InRelease$ 0 0%!r(MISSING)efresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern \\/(Translation-.*)(|\\.bz2|\\.gz|\\.xz)$
    0 0%!r(MISSING)efresh-ims\nrefresh_pattern .\t\t0\t20%!\(MISSING)t4320\n\n\n# upstream proxy, set
    to your own upstream proxy IP to avoid SSRF attacks\n# cache_peer 172.1.1.1 parent
    3128 0 no-query no-digest no-netdb-exchange default \n\n\n##################################
    Reverse Proxy To Sandbox ################################\nhttp_port 8194 accel
    vhost\n# Notice:\n# default is 'sandbox' in dify's github repo, here is 'dify-sandbox'
    because the service name of sandbox is 'dify-sandbox'\n# you can change it to
    your own service name\ncache_peer dify-sandbox parent 8194 0 no-query originserver\nacl
    src_all src all\nhttp_access allow src_all\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: ssrf-proxy-config
  namespace: dify

##### FILE: dify-mirror-deployment_20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/ConfigMap/ssrf-proxy-entrypoint:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  docker-entrypoint-mount.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash

    # Modified based on Squid OCI image entrypoint

    # This entrypoint aims to forward the squid logs to stdout to assist users of
    # common container related tooling (e.g., kubernetes, docker-compose, etc) to
    # access the service logs.

    # Moreover, it invokes the squid binary, leaving all the desired parameters to
    # be provided by the "command" passed to the spawned container. If no command
    # is provided by the user, the default behavior (as per the CMD statement in
    # the Dockerfile) will be to use Ubuntu's default configuration [1] and run
    # squid with the "-NYC" options to mimic the behavior of the Ubuntu provided
    # systemd unit.

    # [1] The default configuration is changed in the Dockerfile to allow local
    # network connections. See the Dockerfile for further information.

    echo "[ENTRYPOINT] re-create snakeoil self-signed certificate removed in the build process"
    if [ ! -f /etc/ssl/private/ssl-cert-snakeoil.key ]; then
        /usr/sbin/make-ssl-cert generate-default-snakeoil --force-overwrite > /dev/null 2>&1
    fi

    tail -F /var/log/squid/access.log 2>/dev/null &
    tail -F /var/log/squid/error.log 2>/dev/null &
    tail -F /var/log/squid/store.log 2>/dev/null &
    tail -F /var/log/squid/cache.log 2>/dev/null &

    # Replace environment variables in the template and output to the squid.conf
    echo "[ENTRYPOINT] replacing environment variables in the template"
    awk '{
        while(match($0, /\${[A-Za-z_][A-Za-z_0-9]*}/)) {
            var = substr($0, RSTART+2, RLENGTH-3)
            val = ENVIRON[var]
            $0 = substr($0, 1, RSTART-1) val substr($0, RSTART+RLENGTH)
        }
        print
    }' /etc/squid/squid.conf.template > /etc/squid/squid.conf

    /usr/sbin/squid -Nz
    echo "[ENTRYPOINT] starting squid"
    /usr/sbin/squid -f /etc/squid/squid.conf -NYC 1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: ssrf-proxy-entrypoint
  namespace: dify

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/Deployment/dify-ssrf:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dify-ssrf
  name: dify-ssrf
  namespace: dify
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dify-ssrf
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dify-ssrf
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - "cp /tmp/docker-entrypoint-mount.sh /docker-entrypoint.sh && sed -i 's/\r$$//'
          /docker-entrypoint.sh && chmod +x /docker-entrypoint.sh && /docker-entrypoint.sh"
        env:
        - name: HTTP_PORT
          value: "3128"
        - name: COREDUMP_DIR
          value: /var/spool/squid
        - name: REVERSE_PROXY_PORT
          value: "8194"
        - name: SANDBOX_HOST
          value: dify-sandbox
        - name: SANDBOX_PORT
          value: "8194"
        image: dockerhub.icu/ubuntu/squid:latest
        name: dify-ssrf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3128
          name: dify-ssrf
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/squid/
          name: ssrf-proxy-config
        - mountPath: /tmp/
          name: ssrf-proxy-entrypoint
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: ssrf-proxy-config
        name: ssrf-proxy-config
      - configMap:
          name: ssrf-proxy-entrypoint
        name: ssrf-proxy-entrypoint

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/ConfigMap/dify-nginx:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: "user  nginx;\nworker_processes  auto;\n\nerror_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log
    notice;\npid        /var/run/nginx.pid;\n\n\nevents {\n    worker_connections
    \ 1024;\n}\n\n\nhttp {\n    include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;\n    default_type
    \ application/octet-stream;\n\n    log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user
    [$time_local] \"$request\" '\n                      '$status $body_bytes_sent
    \"$http_referer\" '\n                      '\"$http_user_agent\" \"$http_x_forwarded_for\"';\n\n
    \   access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;\n\n    sendfile        on;\n
    \   #tcp_nopush     on;\n\n    keepalive_timeout  65;\n\n    #gzip  on;\n    client_max_body_size
    15M;\n\n    server {\n    listen 80;\n    server_name _;\n\n    location /console/api
    {\n      proxy_pass http://dify-api:5001;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For
    $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version
    1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout
    3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout 3600s;\n    }\n\n    location /api {\n      proxy_pass
    http://dify-api:5001;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port
    $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version 1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection
    \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout 3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout
    3600s;\n    }\n\n    location /v1 {\n      proxy_pass http://dify-api:5001;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n      proxy_set_header
    X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n
    \     proxy_http_version 1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection \"\";\n      proxy_buffering
    off;\n      proxy_read_timeout 3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout 3600s;\n    }\n\n
    \   location /files {\n      proxy_pass http://dify-api:5001;\n      proxy_set_header
    X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto
    $scheme;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version
    1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout
    3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout 3600s;\n    }\n    location /explore {\n      proxy_pass
    http://dify-web:3000;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port
    $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version 1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection
    \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout 3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout
    3600s;\n    }\n    \n    location /e/ {\n      proxy_pass http://dify-plugin-daemon:5002;\n
    \     proxy_set_header Dify-Hook-Url ://;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For
    $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version
    1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout
    3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout 3600s;\n  }\n    location / {\n      proxy_pass
    http://dify-web:3000;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n
    \     proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n      proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port
    $server_port;\n      proxy_http_version 1.1;\n      proxy_set_header Connection
    \"\";\n      proxy_buffering off;\n      proxy_read_timeout 3600s;\n      proxy_send_timeout
    3600s;\n    }\n\n    # If you want to support HTTPS, please uncomment the code
    snippet below\n    #listen 443 ssl;\n    #ssl_certificate ./../ssl/your_cert_file.cer;\n
    \   #ssl_certificate_key ./../ssl/your_cert_key.key;\n    #ssl_protocols TLSv1.1
    TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;\n    #ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on;\n    #ssl_session_cache shared:SSL:10m;\n
    \   #ssl_session_timeout 10m;\n}\n}"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dify-nginx
  namespace: dify

        app: dify-nginx

      containers:

            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi

        kubernetes.io/os: linux

          name: dify-nginx
        name: dify-nginx

##### FILE: dify-mirror-deployment_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/StatefulSet/dify-postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: dify-postgres
  namespace: dify
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dify-postgres
  serviceName: dify-postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dify-postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGUSER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: pg-username
              name: dify-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: pg-password
              name: dify-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: dify
        image: dhub.kubesre.xyz/postgres:15-alpine
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - pg_isready
            - -U
            - $(PGUSER)
            - -d
            - $(POSTGRES_DB)
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: dify-postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: postgres-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-data
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: dify-postgres
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /root/dify/db/postgres/data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: postgres-data

---

##### FILE: digitalocean-deploy_14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.0
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        - --enable-metrics=false
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.10.0@sha256:42b3f0e5d0846876b1791cd3afeb5f1cbbe4259d6f35651dcc1b5c980925379c
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.0
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        - --enable-metrics=false
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.10.0@sha256:42b3f0e5d0846876b1791cd3afeb5f1cbbe4259d6f35651dcc1b5c980925379c
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dind:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dind
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dind
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dind
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: /certs
        image: docker:dind
        name: dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2376
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /certs/client
          name: dind-certs
      hostname: dind
      volumes:
      - name: dind-certs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dind-certs

---

##### FILE: dind1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ops/Deployment/docker-dind:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: docker-dind
  name: docker-dind
  namespace: ops
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: docker-dind
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: docker-dind
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST
          value: tcp://0.0.0.0:2375
        - name: DOCKER_TLS_CERTDIR
          value: ""
        image: docker:20.10.22-dind
        name: docker-dind
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2375
          name: daemon-port
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/docker/
          name: docker-dind-data-vol
      volumes:
      - name: docker-dind-data-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: docker-dind-data

---

##### FILE: dind-deploy1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to az-devops/Deployment/azsh-dind:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: azsh-dind-agent
  name: azsh-dind
  namespace: az-devops
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: azsh-dind-agent
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        io.kubernetes.cri-o.userns-mode: auto:size=65536
      labels:
        app: azsh-dind-agent
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /azp/start.sh
        env:
        - name: AZP_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AZP_URL
              name: azdevops
        - name: AZP_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AZP_TOKEN
              name: azdevops
        - name: AZP_POOL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AZP_POOL
              name: azdevops
        image: anvesh35/azsh-dind-agent
        name: dind
      runtimeClassName: sysbox-runc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/foo-bar:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: foo-bar
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: foo
      version: bar
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "15014"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: foo
        test.istio.io/class: standard
        version: bar
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - image: auto
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: istio-proxy
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
      - args:
        - --metrics=15014
        - --cluster=cluster-0
        - --grpc=7070
        - --port=8090
        - --port=8080
        - --port=3333
        - --version=bar
        - --istio-version=
        - --crt=/cert.crt
        - --key=/cert.key
        env:
        - name: INSTANCE_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: testing.hub/app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7070
        - containerPort: 8090
        - containerPort: 8080
        - containerPort: 3333
          name: tcp-health-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          periodSeconds: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: tcp-health-port
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: myregistrykey
      serviceAccountName: foo

---

##### FILE: discovery-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/discovery:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: discovery
  name: discovery
  namespace: default
spec:
  podManagementPolicy: OrderedReady
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: discovery
  serviceName: discovery-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: discovery
        environment: production
        tier: geoserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MY_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: eureka.client.serviceUrl.defaultZone
          value: http://discovery-server-0.discovery-server:8761/eureka
        - name: eureka.instance.hostname
          value: ${MY_POD_NAME}.discovery-server
        image: geoservercloud/geoserver-cloud-discovery:1.9.0
        name: discovery
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8761
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 128Mi
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1001
        runAsGroup: 1001
        runAsUser: 1001

      name: host-dev

##### FILE: disk-calc-job1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/disk-calc:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch08-lab
  name: disk-calc
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - du -h /nginx0/access.log /nginx1/access.log /nginx2/access.log
        image: kiamol/ch03-sleep
        name: calc
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /nginx0/
          name: nginx0
        - mountPath: /nginx1/
          name: nginx1
        - mountPath: /nginx2/
          name: nginx2
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: nginx0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-nginx-stateful-0
      - name: nginx1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-nginx-stateful-1
      - name: nginx2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-nginx-stateful-2

---
