kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch08-lab
  name: disk-calc
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - du -h /nginx0/access.log /nginx1/access.log /nginx2/access.log
        image: kiamol/ch03-sleep
        name: calc
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /nginx0/
          name: nginx0
        - mountPath: /nginx1/
          name: nginx1
        - mountPath: /nginx2/
          name: nginx2
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - name: nginx0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-nginx-stateful-0
      - name: nginx1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-nginx-stateful-1
      - name: nginx2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-nginx-stateful-2

##### FILE: disk-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/disk-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: disk-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: disk-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: disk-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while true; do sleep 1; echo $(date +%!Y(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!d(MISSING):%!H(MISSING):%!M(MISSING):%!S(MISSING)) - $(hostname) >>
          /mnt/index.html; done
        image: busybox
        name: busybox-writer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt
          name: managed-disk-volume
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - httpd -p 80 -f -v -h /mnt
        image: busybox
        name: busybox-web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt
          name: managed-disk-volume
      volumes:
      - azureDisk:
          diskName: <disk name>
          diskURI: <disk resource ID>
          kind: Managed
        name: managed-disk-volume

---

kind: PersistentVolumeClaim

  annotations:
    volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-class: azure-disk
  name: mssql-pvc
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
  storageClassName: default

##### FILE: disk-statefulset_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/managed-disk-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: managed-disk-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: managed-disk-pod
  serviceName: managed-disk-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: managed-disk-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while true; do sleep 1; echo $(date +%!Y(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!d(MISSING):%!H(MISSING):%!M(MISSING):%!S(MISSING)) - $(hostname) >>
          /mnt/index.html; done
        image: busybox
        name: busybox-writer
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt
          name: managed-disk-volume
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - httpd -p 80 -f -v -h /mnt
        image: busybox
        name: busybox-web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt
          name: managed-disk-volume
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: managed-disk-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 5Gi
      storageClassName: default

---

kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: display-this
  namespace: uvasds-services
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - sleep
            - "180"
            envFrom:
            - secretRef:
                name: nem2p-pat
            image: ubuntu
            name: display-this
            resources:
              limits:
                cpu: "0.5"
                memory: 512Mi
              requests:
                cpu: "0.5"
                memory: 512Mi
          restartPolicy: Never
      ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 86400
  schedule: 0 7 * * *

  backoffLimit: 4
  completionMode: Indexed
  completions: 15
  parallelism: 15
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        job: medium-stress
      name: stress-ng-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - apt-get update && apt-get install -y stress-ng && stress-ng --cpu 1 --cpu-ops
          80000  --metrics-brief
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu:latest
        name: stress-ng-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Never

  name: duplicate-division-service-deployment

  replicas: 3

      app: duplicate-division-service

        app: duplicate-division-service

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to tethys/Deployment/django-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: django-app
  namespace: tethys
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: django-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: django-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - django-app
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: gronka/django:latest
        name: django-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

##### FILE: django1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/django:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: django
  name: django
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: django
      tier: app
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: django
        tier: app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: host
              name: postgres-creds
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_name
              name: postgres-creds
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: postgres-creds
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: postgres-creds
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: port
              name: postgres-creds
        - name: ALLOWED_HOSTS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ALLOWED_HOSTS
              name: django-secret
        - name: CORS_TRUSTED_ORIGINS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: CORS_TRUSTED_ORIGINS
              name: django-secret
        - name: DJANGO_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DJANGO_SECRET_KEY
              name: django-secret
        - name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
              name: django-secret
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
              name: django-secret
        - name: AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME
              name: django-secret
        - name: AWS_S3_REGION_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_S3_REGION_NAME
              name: django-secret
        image: djangoweather-django:latest
        name: app
      - image: djangoweather-proxy:latest
        name: proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: proxy

##### FILE: django-deploy1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/assignment3-django-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: assignment3-django-deploy
  name: assignment3-django-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: assignment3-django-deploy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: assignment3-django-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_password
              name: giftcard-app-secrets
        - name: APP_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: app_secret
              name: giftcard-app-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db_name
              name: giftcard-app-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: ALLOWED_HOSTS
          value: '*,'
        image: nyuappsec/assign3:v0
        name: assignment3-django-deploy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/busybox
          name: mysql-volume-mount
        - mountPath: /vol/static
          name: static-data-volume-mount
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-volume-mount
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc
      - name: static-data-volume-mount
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: static-data-pvc

---

##### FILE: django-deployment.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/django:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: django
    tier: frontend
  name: django
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: django
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: django
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: USUARIO_BD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql_user
              name: django-datos
        - name: CONTRASENA_BD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_password
              name: django-secret
        - name: HOST_BD
          value: mariadb
        - name: NOMBRE_BD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql_database
              name: django-datos
        - name: DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: django_password
              name: django-secret
        - name: DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: django_user
              name: django-datos
        - name: DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: django_email
              name: django-datos
        - name: ALLOWED_HOSTS
          value: '*'
        image: mmarnun/django:v2
        name: contenedor-django
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http-server

##### FILE: django-hello-world-ingress.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/django-hello-world-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  labels:
    role: ingress
  name: django-hello-world-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: hello-world.example.org
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: django-hello-world-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: django-staticfiles.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to django-app/Job/django-staticfiles:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: django-staticfiles
  namespace: django-app
spec:
  activeDeadLineSeconds: 60
  bacofflimit: 3
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - python
        - manage.py
        - collectstatic
        - --noinput
        envFrom:
          configMapRef: app-cm
        image: ivicazuz/django-kubernetes:1.0
        imagePulPolicy: Always
        name: staticfiles-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/static
          name: staticfiles
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      volumes:
      - name: staticfiles
        persistentVolumeClaim: staticfiles-pvc
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 100

---

##### FILE: dkron-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dkron:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dkron
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dkron
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dkron
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/local/bin/dkron
        - agent
        - --server
        - --bootstrap-expect=1
        image: docker.io/dkron/dkron:3.2.7
        name: dkron
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /curl
          name: dkroncurl
        - mountPath: /bisa
          name: dirbuatcurl
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dirbuatcurl
      - configMap:
          name: dkroncurl
        name: dkroncurl

---

##### FILE: dkron-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dkron:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dkron
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dkron
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dkron
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /usr/local/bin/dkron
        - agent
        - --server
        - --bootstrap-expect=1
        image: docker.io/dkron/dkron:3.2.7
        limits:
          cpu: 1500m
          memory: 1500Mi
        name: dkron
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources: null
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /curl
          name: dkroncurl
        - mountPath: /bisa
          name: dirbuatcurl
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: tz-config
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dirbuatcurl
      - configMap:
          name: dkroncurl
        name: dkroncurl
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
          type: File
        name: tz-config

---


Mutation:

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-dl-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-dl-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-dl-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/my-project-27779-401121/my-dl-app:latest
        name: my-dl-app
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/new_data
          name: model-data-volume
      volumes:
      - name: model-data-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: new-data-pvc

---

##### FILE: dns18_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/coredns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: coredns
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: coredns
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: coredns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -conf
        - /etc/coredns/Corefile
        image: coredns/coredns:1.10.0
        name: coredns
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5353
          name: dns
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 5353
          name: dns-tcp
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/coredns
          name: config-volume
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: Corefile
            path: Corefile
          name: coredns
        name: config-volume

---

##### FILE: dns19_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/coredns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: coredns
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: coredns
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: coredns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -conf
        - /etc/coredns/Corefile
        image: coredns/coredns:1.10.0
        name: coredns
        ports:
        - containerPort: 53
          name: dns
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 53
          name: dns-tcp
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - all
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/coredns
          name: config-volume
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: Corefile
            path: Corefile
          name: coredns
        name: config-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dns-checker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: dns-checker
  name: dns-checker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dns-checker
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dns-checker
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN
          value: _______________________________
        - name: TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID
          value: _______________________________
        - name: DNS_NAMES
          value: kubernetes.default.svc.cluster.local,google.com,hubble-ui.kube-system.svc.cluster.local
        - name: CHECK_INTERVAL
          value: "10"
        - name: DNS_TIMEOUT
          value: "2"
        image: vcr.vngcloud.vn/60108-annd2-ingress/dns-check:0.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dns-checker
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/hosts
          name: custom-hosts
          subPath: hosts
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: custom-hosts
        name: custom-hosts

---

##### FILE: dnsclass_editor_role.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/dnsclass-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kubedns-shepherd
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: dnsclass-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kubedns-shepherd
  name: dnsclass-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - config.kubedns-shepherd.io
  resources:
  - dnsclasses
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - config.kubedns-shepherd.io
  resources:
  - dnsclasses/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

            pods insecure

            grpcport 9288
        }

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/dns-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    addon.kops.k8s.io/name: dns-controller.addons.k8s.io
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kops
    k8s-addon: dns-controller.addons.k8s.io
    k8s-app: dns-controller
    version: v1.30.0-alpha.1
  name: dns-controller
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: dns-controller
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        k8s-addon: dns-controller.addons.k8s.io
        k8s-app: dns-controller
        kops.k8s.io/managed-by: kops
        version: v1.30.0-alpha.1
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
                operator: Exists
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - args:
        - --watch-ingress=false
        - --dns=aws-route53
        - --zone=*/Z1AFAKE1ZON3YO
        - --internal-ipv4
        - --zone=*/*
        - -v=2
        env:
        - name: KUBERNETES_SERVICE_HOST
          value: 127.0.0.1
        - name: AWS_ROLE_ARN
          value: arn:aws-test:iam::123456789012:role/dns-controller.kube-system.sa.minimal.example.com
        - name: AWS_WEB_IDENTITY_TOKEN_FILE
          value: /var/run/secrets/amazonaws.com/token
        image: registry.k8s.io/kops/dns-controller:1.30.0-alpha.1
        name: dns-controller
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/amazonaws.com/
          name: token-amazonaws-com
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: Default
      hostNetwork: true
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 10001
      serviceAccount: dns-controller
      tolerations:
      - key: node.cloudprovider.kubernetes.io/uninitialized
        operator: Exists
      - key: node.kubernetes.io/not-ready
        operator: Exists
      - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - name: token-amazonaws-com
        projected:
          defaultMode: 420
          sources:
          - serviceAccountToken:
              audience: amazonaws.com
              expirationSeconds: 86400
              path: token

##### FILE: dns-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/chaos-dns-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: chaos-dns-server
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: chaos-mesh
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: chaos-mesh
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.0.0
    helm.sh/chart: chaos-mesh-0.0.0
  name: chaos-dns-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: chaos-dns-server
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
      app.kubernetes.io/name: chaos-mesh
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: chaos-dns-server
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: chaos-mesh
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: chaos-mesh
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.0.0
        helm.sh/chart: chaos-mesh-0.0.0
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app.kubernetes.io/component
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - chaos-dns-server
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - -conf
        - /etc/chaos-dns/Corefile
        image: ghcr.io/chaos-mesh/chaos-coredns:v0.2.6
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: chaos-dns-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5353
          name: dns
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 5353
          name: dns-tcp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9153
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9288
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8181
            scheme: HTTP
        resources:
          limits: {}
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 70Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - all
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/chaos-dns
          name: config-volume
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: Default
      priorityClassName: null
      serviceAccountName: chaos-dns-server
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: Corefile
            path: Corefile
          name: dns-server-config
        name: config-volume

---

##### FILE: dns-deployment1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/Deployment/chaos-dns-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: chaos-dns-server
  name: chaos-dns-server
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: dynamic_parameters
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: chaos-dns-server
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations: null
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: chaos-dns-server
    spec:
      affinity: null
      containers:
      - args:
        - -conf
        - /etc/chaos-dns/Corefile
        image: dynamic_parameters
        imagePullPolicy: dynamic_parameters
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: chaos-dns-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5353
          name: dns
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 5353
          name: dns-tcp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9153
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: dynamic_parameters
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8181
            scheme: HTTP
        resources: null
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - all
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/chaos-dns
          name: config-volume
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: Default
      imagePullSecrets: dynamic_parameters
      nodeSelector: null
      priorityClassName: dynamic_parameters
      serviceAccountName: dynamic_parameters
      tolerations: null
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: Corefile
            path: Corefile
          name: dns-server-config
        name: config-volume

---

kind: Ingress

  name: ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: mo.ija.kro.kr
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: user-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: chat-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /message/
        pathType: Prefix

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dnsmax:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dnsmax
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dnsmax
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dnsmax
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - infinity
        image: registry.k8s.io/e2e-test-images/jessie-dnsutils:1.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dnsutils
      dnsConfig:
        nameservers:
        - 10.43.68.254
        searches:
        - intranet.local
      dnsPolicy: None
      restartPolicy: Always

    protocol: TCP

    protocol: TCP

    port: 9288
    protocol: TCP

##### FILE: dns-test.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/dns-test:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: dns-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: busybox
    name: dns-test
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
        memory: 2Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 500m
        ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
        memory: 2Gi
  tolerations:
  - effect: NoSchedule
    key: kubernetes.io/arch
    operator: Equal
    value: amd64
  - effect: NoExecute
    key: node.kubernetes.io/not-ready
    operator: Exists
    tolerationSeconds: 300
  - effect: NoExecute
    key: node.kubernetes.io/unreachable
    operator: Exists
    tolerationSeconds: 300

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/dns-test

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/dns-test
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/dns-test failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/dns-test failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/dns-test failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

kind: Namespace

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/dnsutils:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: dnsutils
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/dnsutils:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: dnsutils
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/dnsutils:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: dnsutils
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/dnsutils:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: dnsutils
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/ingress-nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/ingress-nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

##### FILE: docker-cleanup-cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to openhands/CronJob/docker-cleanup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: docker-cleanup
  namespace: openhands
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - |
              echo "Starting Docker cleanup process on golyat-1 node"
              # Docker
              docker system prune -af --volumes
              echo "Docker cleanup completed"
            image: docker:cli
            name: docker-cleanup
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /var/run/docker.sock
              name: docker-sock
          nodeSelector:
            kubernetes.io/hostname: golyat-1
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - hostPath:
              path: /var/run/docker.sock
              type: Socket
            name: docker-sock
  schedule: 0 0 * * *

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: docker-jenkins-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: docker-jenkins-demo

    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: docker-jenkins-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: houssembel/express-sqlite
        name: docker-jenkins-demo
        ports:

          name: demo-http

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to docker-login-page/Deployment/frontend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: docker-login-page
    tier: frontend
  name: frontend
  namespace: docker-login-page
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: docker-login-page
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: docker-login-page
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_root_pass
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_database
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_user
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_password
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: mysql-svc
        image: dockerloginpage/frontend:v1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: webapp1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: docker-login-app-manifest_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to docker-login-page/Deployment/backend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: docker-login-page
    tier: backend
  name: backend
  namespace: docker-login-page
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: docker-login-page
      tier: backend
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: docker-login-page
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_root_pass
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_database
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_user
              name: database-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_password
              name: database-secret
        image: dockerloginpage/backend:v1.0.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-pvc

---

##### FILE: docker-registry2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to docker-registry/StatefulSet/docker-registry:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: docker-registry
  name: docker-registry
  namespace: docker-registry
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: docker-registry
  serviceName: docker-registry
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: docker-registry
    spec:
      containers:
      - env: []
        image: registry:2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: registry
        resources: {}
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/registry
          name: registry-data
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: registry-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 50Gi

---

##### FILE: docker-registry2_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to docker-registry/Ingress/docker-registry:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: ca-issuer
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/affinity: cookie
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-body-size: 8192m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/session-cookie-hash: sha1
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/session-cookie-name: docker-registry
  name: docker-registry
  namespace: docker-registry
spec:
  rules:
  - host: docker.apps.IPADDR.nip.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: docker-registry
            port:
              number: 5000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - docker.apps.IPADDR.nip.io
    secretName: ingress-tls-certificate

  namespace: docker-registry

      app: docker-registry

          value: :5000

        name: docker-registry

        - containerPort: 5000
          protocol: TCP

kind: PersistentVolume

  name: docker-registry-pv
  namespace: default

  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 10Gi
  local:
    path: /run/desktop/mnt/host/c/docker-registry

    required:
      nodeSelectorTerms:
      - matchExpressions:
        - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
          operator: In
          values:
          - docker-desktop
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Delete
  storageClassName: hostpath
  volumeMode: Filesystem

##### FILE: docker-registry-tls_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to docker-registry/Deployment/docker-registry:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: docker-registry
  name: docker-registry
  namespace: docker-registry
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: docker-registry
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: docker-registry
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REGISTRY_HTTP_ADDR
          value: 0.0.0.0:5000
        - name: REGISTRY_STORAGE_FILESYSTEM_ROOTDIRECTORY
          value: /var/lib/registry
        - name: REGISTRY_HTTP_TLS_CERTIFICATE
          value: /certs/tls.crt
        - name: REGISTRY_HTTP_TLS_KEY
          value: /certs/tls.key
        - name: REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        image: registry:2
        name: docker-registry
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/registry
          name: storage
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
        - mountPath: /etc/docker/registry
          name: config
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: docker-registry
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: docker-registry-tls-cert
      - configMap:
          name: docker-registry-config
          optional: false
        name: config

---

        - name: TAGLIST_PAGE_SIZE
          value: "100"

          value: "false"

          value: "1000"

        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: dockge2_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to network/Ingress/lan-dockge:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTP
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: lan-dockge
    app.kubernetes.io/name: lan-dockge
  name: lan-dockge
  namespace: network
spec:
  ingressClassName: internal
  rules:
  - host: dockge.${SECRET_DOMAIN}
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: lan-dockge
            port:
              name: http
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

        app: document-store

      containers:

        - name: ConnectionStrings__RabbitMQ
        - name: CosmosDB__ContainerName
        - name: CosmosDB__DatabaseName

        name: document-store
        ports:

          protocol: TCP

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dogpic-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: dogpic-web
  name: dogpic-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: dogpic-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: dogpic-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: learncloudnative/dogpic-service:0.1.0
        name: dogpic-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

##### FILE: dolphinschedulercluster_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/dolphinschedulercluster-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: dolphinscheduler-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: dolphinschedulercluster-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: dolphinscheduler-operator
  name: dolphinschedulercluster-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - dolphinscheduler.kubedoop.dev
  resources:
  - dolphinschedulerclusters
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - dolphinscheduler.kubedoop.dev
  resources:
  - dolphinschedulerclusters/status
  verbs:
  - get

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

  - apps
  resources:
  - statefulsets

  - get
  - list
  - watch
  - create
  - update
  - patch
  - delete

  - ""

  - persistentvolumes

  - watch

  - update

  - dappmesh.io

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/ai-page-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/issuer: wildward-issuer
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-body-size: 500m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-connect-timeout: "6000"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-next-upstream-timeout: "6000"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "6000"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-send-timeout: "6000"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
  name: ai-page-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: domain.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: ai-page-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - domain.com
    secretName: ai-page-wtls-secret

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to splunkuba/ReplicationController/domaintopic-modelgroup01-rc:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: domaintopic-modelgroup01-rc
  namespace: splunkuba
spec:
  replicas: 2
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: domaintopic-modelgroup01
        uba-displayName: UBA_Streaming_Models_domaintopic-modelgroup01
        uba-groupName: ubastreamingmodels
        uba-serviceName: realtimemodels
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/caspida/bin/UBAFunctionExecutor
        - com.caspida.streaming.docker.KafkaModelFunctionExecutor
        - -n
        - splunkuba
        - -G
        - domaintopic-modelgroup01
        - -f
        - MalwareCommunication
        - -f
        - WebShellDetection
        env:
        - name: UBA_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: UBA_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: UBA_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: UBA_HOSTIP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.hostIP
        - name: UBA_NODENAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: UBA_POD_MAXHEAP
          value: 4G
        - name: UBA_POD_GROUPNAME
          value: ubastreamingmodels
        - name: RUN_AS_USER
          value: null
        - name: RUN_AS_GROUP
          value: null
        image: sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01:5000/ubabase:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - startup
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLifecycleHook.sh
              - shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /opt/caspida/bin/ContainerLivenessProbe.sh
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 900
          periodSeconds: 900
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: domaintopic-modelgroup01
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
          name: log-volume
          readOnly: false
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-01
        ip: 10.141.39.46
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-02
        ip: 10.141.39.205
      - hostnames:
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03.sv.splunk.com
        - sujits-uba53-rhel-k8s-03
        ip: 10.141.39.184
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/vcap/sys/log/caspida/containerization
        name: log-volume

---

##### FILE: doodle-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to osai-kube/Deployment/doodle-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: doodle-deployment
  namespace: osai-kube
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: doodle
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: doodle
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/hubs-dev-333333/ocho-osai/browserlab/doodle@sha256:147ab1a673ea53dd3ae4ae3822eaab362fea5e50c294ff3c661e12ddf891f4e4
        name: doodle
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001
        resources:
          limits:
            nvidia.com/gpu: 1
      - args:
        - --config=/etc/gatekeeper/config.yaml
        - --listen=0.0.0.0:3000
        image: quay.io/keycloak/keycloak-gatekeeper
        name: gatekeeper
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/gatekeeper
          name: gatekeeper-doodle-config
      nodeSelector:
        pool: doodle
      volumes:
      - name: gatekeeper-doodle-config
        secret:
          secretName: gatekeeper-doodle-secret

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dos-game:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dos-game
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dos-game
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dos-game
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: public.ecr.aws/o9r8h0v8/dos-game-repo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: dos-game-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5

---

    - /etc/secret-volume

##### FILE: dotnet-api1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to elympics/Deployment/dotnet-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dotnet-api
  namespace: elympics
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dotnet-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dotnet-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT
          value: Development
        - name: ASPNETCORE_URLS
          value: http://*:8001
        - name: GolangServiceConfig__Url
          value: http://golang-api-service:8000
        - name: ConnectionStrings__DefaultConnection
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: connection-string
              name: postgres-secret
        image: corey773/elympics-dotnet:latest
        name: dotnet-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001

---

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource elympics/Deployment/dotnet-api

        name: dotnet-app

##### FILE: dovecot-dict-auth-conf-ext.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mailserver/ConfigMap/dovecot-dict-auth-conf-ext:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  dovecot-dict-auth.conf.ext: |
    # This file is commonly accessed via passdb {} or userdb {} section in
    # conf.d/auth-dict.conf.ext

    # Dictionary URI
    #uri =

    # Default password scheme
    default_pass_scheme = MD5

    # Username iteration prefix. Keys under this are assumed to contain usernames.
    iterate_prefix = userdb/

    # Should iteration be disabled for this userdb? If this userdb acts only as a
    # cache there's no reason to try to iterate the (partial & duplicate) users.
    #iterate_disable = no

    # The example here shows how to do multiple dict lookups and merge the replies.
    # The "passdb" and "userdb" keys are JSON objects containing key/value pairs,
    # for example: { "uid": 1000, "gid": 1000, "home": "/home/user" }

    key passdb {
      key = passdb/%!u(MISSING)
      format = json
    }
    key userdb {
      key = userdb/%!u(MISSING)
      format = json
    }
    key quota {
      key = userdb/%!u(MISSING)/quota
      #format = value
      # The default_value is used if the key isn't found. If default_value setting
      # isn't specified at all (even as empty), the passdb/userdb lookup fails with
      # "user doesn't exist".
      default_value = 100M
    }

    # Space separated list of keys whose values contain key/value paired objects.
    # All the key/value pairs inside the object are added as passdb fields.
    passdb_objects = passdb

    #passdb_fields {
    #}

    # Userdb key/value object list.
    userdb_objects = userdb

    userdb_fields {
      # dict:<key> refers to key names
      quota_rule = *:storage=%!{(MISSING)dict:quota}

      # dict:<key>.<objkey> refers to the objkey inside (JSON) object
      mail = maildir:%!{(MISSING)dict:userdb.home}/Maildir
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dovecot-dict-auth-conf-ext
  namespace: mailserver

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: dovecot-dict-sql-conf-ext.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mailserver/ConfigMap/dovecot-dict-sql-conf-ext:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  dovecot-dict-sql.conf.ext: |
    # This file is commonly accessed via dict {} section in dovecot.conf

    #connect = host=localhost dbname=mails user=testuser password=pass

    # CREATE TABLE quota (
    #   username varchar(100) not null,
    #   bytes bigint not null default 0,
    #   messages integer not null default 0,
    #   primary key (username)
    # );

    map {
      pattern = priv/quota/storage
      table = quota
      username_field = username
      value_field = bytes
    }
    map {
      pattern = priv/quota/messages
      table = quota
      username_field = username
      value_field = messages
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dovecot-dict-sql-conf-ext
  namespace: mailserver

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: dovecot-oauth2-conf-ext.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mailserver/ConfigMap/dovecot-oauth2-conf-ext:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  dovecot-oauth2.conf.ext: |
    ### OAuth2 password database configuration

    ## url for verifying token validity. Token is appended to the URL
    # tokeninfo_url = http://endpoint/oauth/tokeninfo?access_token=

    ## introspection endpoint, used to gather extra fields and other information.
    # introspection_url = http://endpoint/oauth/me

    ## How introspection is made, valid values are
    ##   auth = GET request with Bearer authentication
    ##   get  = GET request with token appended to URL
    ##   post = POST request with token=bearer_token as content
    ##   local = perform local validation only
    # introspection_mode = auth

    ## Force introspection even if tokeninfo contains wanted fields
    ## Set this to yes if you are using active_attribute
    # force_introspection = no

    ## Validation key dictionary (e.g. fs:posix:prefix=/etc/dovecot/keys/)
    ## Lookup key is /shared/<azp:default>/<alg>/<kid:default>
    # local_validation_key_dict =

    ## A single wanted scope of validity (optional)
    # scope = something

    ## username attribute in response (default: email)
    # username_attribute = email

    ## username normalization format (default: %!L(MISSING)u)
    # username_format = %!L(MISSING)u

    ## Attribute name for checking whether account is disabled (optional)
    # active_attribute =

    ## Expected value in active_attribute (empty = require present, but anything goes)
    # active_value =

    ## Expected issuer(s) for the token (space separated list)
    # issuers =

    ## URL to RFC 7628 OpenID Provider Configuration Information schema
    # openid_configuration_url =

    ## Extra fields to set in passdb response (in passdb static style)
    # pass_attrs =

    ## Timeout in milliseconds
    # timeout_msecs = 0

    ## Enable debug logging
    # debug = no

    ## Max parallel connections (how many simultaneous connections to open)
    # max_parallel_connections = 10

    ## Max pipelined requests (how many requests to send per connection, requires server-side support)
    # max_pipelined_requests = 1

    ## HTTP request raw log directory
    # rawlog_dir = /tmp/oauth2

    ## TLS settings
    # tls_ca_cert_file = /path/to/ca-certificates.txt
    # tls_ca_cert_dir = /path/to/certs/
    # tls_cert_file = /path/to/client/cert
    # tls_key_file = /path/to/client/key
    # tls_cipher_suite = HIGH:!SSLv2
    # tls_allow_invalid_cert = FALSE
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dovecot-oauth2-conf-ext
  namespace: mailserver

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: dovecot-openssl-cnf.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mailserver/ConfigMap/dovecot-openssl-cnf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  dovecot-openssl.cnf: |
    [ req ]
    default_bits = 2048
    encrypt_key = yes
    distinguished_name = req_dn
    x509_extensions = cert_type
    prompt = no

    [ req_dn ]
    # country (2 letter code)
    #C=FI

    # State or Province Name (full name)
    #ST=

    # Locality Name (eg. city)
    #L=Helsinki

    # Organization (eg. company)
    #O=Dovecot

    # Organizational Unit Name (eg. section)
    OU=IMAP server

    # Common Name (*.example.com is also possible)
    CN=imap.example.com

    # E-mail contact
    emailAddress=postmaster@example.com

    [ cert_type ]
    nsCertType = server
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dovecot-openssl-cnf
  namespace: mailserver

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/downward:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: downward
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "9999999"
    env:
    - name: POD_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.name
    - name: POD_NAMESPACE
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.namespace
    - name: POD_IP
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: status.podIP
    - name: NODE_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: spec.nodeName
    - name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
    - name: CONTAINER_CPU_REQUEST_MILLICORES
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          divisor: 1m
          resource: requests.cpu
    - name: CONTAINER_MEMORY_LIMIT_KIBIBYTES
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          divisor: 1Ki
          resource: limits.memory
    image: busybox
    name: main
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 4Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 15m
        memory: 100Ki

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/downward:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: downward
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "9999999"
    env:
    - name: POD_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.name
    - name: POD_NAMESPACE
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.namespace
    - name: POD_IP
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: status.podIP
    - name: NODE_NAME
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: spec.nodeName
    - name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
      valueFrom:
        fieldRef:
          fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
    - name: CONTAINER_CPU_REQUEST_MILLICORES
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          divisor: 1m
          resource: requests.cpu
    - name: CONTAINER_MEMORY_LIMIT_KIBIBYTES
      valueFrom:
        resourceFieldRef:
          divisor: 1Ki
          resource: limits.memory
    image: busybox
    name: main
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 4Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 15m
        memory: 100Ki

##### FILE: downward-api-volume.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/downward:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    key1: value1
    key2: |
      multi
      line
      value
  labels:
    foo: bar
  name: downward
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "9999999"
    image: busybox
    name: main
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 4Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 15m
        memory: 100Ki
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/downward
      name: downward
  volumes:
  - downwardAPI:
      items:
      - fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.name
        path: podName
      - fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        path: podNamespace
      - fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.labels
        path: labels
      - fieldRef:
          fieldPath: metadata.annotations
        path: annotations
      - path: containerCpuRequestMilliCores
        resourceFieldRef:
          containerName: main
          divisor: 1m
          resource: requests.cpu
      - path: containerMemoryLimitBytes
        resourceFieldRef:
          containerName: main
          divisor: 1
          resource: limits.memory
    name: downward

---
